title: Cache-Up
description: A tech news aggregation platform that summarizes articles into concise updates using AI-powered pipelines and vector search integration.

title: Brain MRI Segmentation Tool (GRACE/DOMINO)
description: Web-based interface and backend deployment for GRACE and DOMINO models, allowing clinicians to segment brain images efficiently.

title: Multilingual Vocabulary App
description: An educational app for Hindi, Marathi, and Sanskrit built using Flutter and Swift. Features 50K+ vocabulary entries with real-time sync.

title: Marketing Analytics Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard using Tableau and Power BI for analyzing ad campaign metrics, uncovering insights for finance strategy.

title: Microservices Architecture for Bharat Tyres
description: Developed a secure and scalable cloud-based microservice system with CI/CD pipelines and OAuth2 integration.
